text: Egha mɨzarazibar ia ghaze, ghuariam korogha pɨzɨma, aruem aghevezɨ, ezɨ ia ghaze, amozim datɨrɨghɨn izɨtɨma, dughiam deraghan kogham. Guizbangɨra, ia overiamɨn otivir biziba deravɨra dagh fo. Egha ia dughiar kamɨn otivir arazibar gara da abɨzir puvatɨ.(16:2-3) Fofozir gumazir avɨriba ghaze, ves 2 ko ves 3ɨn itir mɨgɨrɨgɨaba, gumazir igharazir mam gɨn da osiri. Egha ghaze, Matyu da osirizir puvatɨ.
